Package uk.ac.aston.coursework.elevator.objects

Class Building

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.aston.coursework.elevator.objects.Building
  • public class Building
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Building and contains an array of floors, an elevator and an Arrival Generator that generates people.
    Author:
    nisat
